EXECUTE.notes: Phase 7 complete. Removed all re-export facades. Updated all module files (40+ Python files) to use canonical import paths (core.*, modules.*.*). Created 3 new core utility files (printer_utils.py, quota.py, webhook_utils.py) for unique logic from deps.py. Deleted 27 backend root stubs, models.py, schemas.py, deps.py, auth.py, config.py, crypto.py, ws_hub.py, rate_limit.py, db_utils.py, and entire routers/ directory. Updated entrypoint.sh to import from core.base and all domain modules. Fixed test files (test_printer_models.py, test_print_file_meta.py, test_mqtt_linking.py) to use canonical paths. Updated CLAUDE.md architecture section. make test baseline unchanged: 1 failed (pre-existing), 54 passed, 10 skipped, 81 errors.
